localised_text.tooltip_text: Toggle Path to Glory Notifications||If checked, Path to Glory notifications for this character won't be shown on the End Turn button.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | Key.Contains("kho") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Khorne" | Key.Contains("nur") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Nurgle" | Key.Contains("und") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Chaos_Undivided" | Key.Contains("sla") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Slaaensh" | Key.Contains("tze") => "UI_CAM_HUD_WoC_DLC20_Path_To_Glory_Tzeentch"

component_text.text: Turn off Path to Glory notifications for this character

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (img = this.InitiativeContext.ImagePath) => { img | img.Contains("_nur") => ToColour(206, 246, 0) | img.Contains("_kho") => ToColour(234, 74, 31) | img.Contains("_sla") => ToColour(255, 67, 255) | img.Contains("_tze") => ToColour(99, 206, 234) | img.Contains("_und") => ToColour(250, 213, 0) }

(img = this.InitiativeContext.ImagePath) => { img | img.Contains("_nur") => ToColour(206, 246, 0) | img.Contains("_kho") => ToColour(234, 74, 31) | img.Contains("_sla") => ToColour(255, 67, 255) | img.Contains("_tze") => ToColour(99, 206, 234) | img.Contains("_und") => ToColour(250, 213, 0) }
